name: webcams_list_limit_limit_offset
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool webcams_travel.
Tool description: The World's Largest Landscape Webcam API ***** Get webcams by categories, country, region or just nearby your location ***** Get timelapse slideshows for every webcam ***** Get an uncluttered webcam layer for your map
API description: This is a modifier. Returns the list of webcams sliced by {limit}. The optional offset is given by {offset}. Required: {limit}. The maximum value for {limit} is 50. {offset} defaults to 0. If limit is not given, then a default of limit=10 is applied.

limit.description: Maximum number of webcams in the result list. The maximum allowable value is 50.

offset.description: Offset for the first item in the result list. Defaults to 0.

lang.description: Localize the results to this language, if available. Default: "en".

show.description: Content to be listed in the response. Possible values are: "webcams", "categories", "continents", "countries", "regions", "properties". Default is "webcams".
